00029 #include "syx-platform.h"
00030 
00031 EXPORT extern syx_uint64 syx_nanotime (void);
00032 EXPORT extern void syx_profile_print (void);
00033 
00034 #define SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(p) EXPORT extern syx_uint64 _p_ ## p
00035 
00036 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(load_image);
00037 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(exec_state_fetch);
00038 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(block_context);
00039 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(method_context);
00040 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(send_message);
00041 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(perform_message);
00042 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(dict_access);
00043 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(fileop);
00044 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(blocking);
00045 SYX_PROFILE_ETYPE(scheduler);
00046 
00047 #ifdef SYX_PROFILE
00048 #define SYX_START_PROFILE syx_uint64 _p_start = syx_nanotime() / 1000
00049 #else
00050 #define SYX_START_PROFILE
00051 #endif
00052 
00053 #ifdef SYX_PROFILE
00054 #define SYX_END_PROFILE(p) _p_ ## p = _p_ ## p + syx_nanotime() / 1000 - _p_start
00055 #else
00056 #define SYX_END_PROFILE(p)
00057 #endif
